description: Variation of Condition 5 of Outline Planning Permission ref: PA/13/02966 and dated 19 December 2014 (as amended) which gave permission for:Outline application (all matters reserved) for mixed-use redevelopment of the site known as 'WoodWharf' comprising:Demolition of existing buildings and structures, including dwellings at Lovegrove Walk;The erection of buildings, including tall buildings and basements, comprising:Residential units (Use Class C3);Hotel (C1);Business floorspace (B1);Retail (A1-A5);Community and Leisure (D1 and D2); andSui Generis uses.Associated infrastructure, including the creation of structures in Blackwall Basin, Graving Dock, and South Dock;Streets, open spaces, landscaping and public realm;Bridge links;Car, motorcycle and bicycle parking spaces and servicing spaces;Utilities including energy centres and electricity substation(s); and,other works incidental to the proposed development)The application seeks to amend the approved Control Documents in order to "slot out" Development Plot F1 and surrounding land above and below ground.
